1645.last_action: Introduced, Referred to Assembly Judiciary Committee
1645.title: Prohibits juror disqualification based on gender identity or sexual orientation; codifies procedures when discriminatory use of peremptory challenges is alleged.
1645.description: Prohibits juror disqualification based on gender identity or sexual orientation; codifies procedures when discriminatory use of peremptory challenges is alleged.

1739.last_action: Introduced, Referred to Assembly Financial Institutions and Insurance Committee
1739.title: Prohibits unfair discrimination in issuing or rating life insurance policies based on transgender status or certain gender identity information.
1739.description: Prohibits unfair discrimination in issuing or rating life insurance policies based on transgender status or certain gender identity information.

2458.last_action: Introduced, Referred to Assembly Health Committee
2458.title: Requires hospitals to collect and report data on gender identity and sexual orientation in relation to coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
2458.description: Requires hospitals to collect and report data on gender identity and sexual orientation in relation to coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).

3097.last_action: Introduced, Referred to Assembly Law and Public Safety Committee
3097.title: Requires DOC to assign transgender inmate to State correctional facility based on inmate's gender identity and use inmate's preferred gender pronoun.
3097.description: Requires DOC to assign transgender inmate to State correctional facility based on inmate's gender identity and use inmate's preferred gender pronoun.

3141.last_action: Introduced, Referred to Assembly Human Services Committee
3141.title: Requires collection of voluntary, self-disclosed information about sexual orientation and gender identity in certain surveys by State agencies.
3141.description: Requires collection of voluntary, self-disclosed information about sexual orientation and gender identity in certain surveys by State agencies.

3770.last_action: Introduced, Referred to Assembly Education Committee
3770.title: Prohibits board of education from providing instruction in family life education, sex education, sexual health, sexual orientation, or gender identity to students in preschool through grade four.
3770.description: Prohibits board of education from providing instruction in family life education, sex education, sexual health, sexual orientation, or gender identity to students in preschool through grade four.

4395.last_action: Introduced, Referred to Assembly State and Local Government Committee
4395.title: Requires State blanks, forms, documents, and applications to incorporate new standards for collection of information about sex, gender, gender identity, and sexual orientation.
4395.description: Requires State blanks, forms, documents, and applications to incorporate new standards for collection of information about sex, gender, gender identity, and sexual orientation.

5052.last_action: Introduced, Referred to Assembly Health Committee
5052.title: Establishes certain protections for persons, providing, receiving, and allowing children to receive gender-affirming health care.
5052.description: Establishes certain protections for persons, providing, receiving, and allowing children to receive gender-affirming health care.

8375.last_action: Introduced in the Senate, Referred to Senate Education Committee
8375.title: Prohibits school districts from incorporating instruction on sexual orientation or gender identity for students in grades kindergarten through six; requires consent from parents or guardians for students in grades seven through 12 for instruction on sexual orientation or gender identity.
8375.description: Prohibits school districts from incorporating instruction on sexual orientation or gender identity for students in grades kindergarten through six; requires consent from parents or guardians for students in grades seven through 12 for instruction on sexual orientation or gender identity.
